segment.source: Application Virtualization packages, accessible via the Packages node in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, enable you to control virtual application versions on your Application Virtualization Management Servers.
segment.target: Application Virtualization packages, accessible via the Packages node in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, enable you to control virtual application versions on your Application Virtualization Management Servers.

segment.source: Provides a step-by-step procedure for adding a package to the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.
segment.target: Provides a step-by-step procedure for adding a package to the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.

segment.source: How to Add a Package Version
segment.target: How to Add a Package Version

segment.source: Provides a step-by-step procedure for adding a new version of the package to the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.
segment.target: Provides a step-by-step procedure for adding a new version of the package to the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.

segment.source: Provides a step-by-step procedure for deleting a package from the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.
segment.target: Provides a step-by-step procedure for deleting a package from the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.

segment.source: How to Delete a Package Version
segment.target: How to Delete a Package Version

segment.source: Provides a step-by-step procedure for deleting a specific version of a package from the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.
segment.target: Provides a step-by-step procedure for deleting a specific version of a package from the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.

segment.source: Provides a step-by-step procedure for upgrading a package version on the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.
segment.target: Provides a step-by-step procedure for upgrading a package version on the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.
